resources: 0 Stars CustomActivityShowcase Basic Example In this Basic Example, you simply start the custom activity, and then from the device you send a final payload to close the activity Basic Conversational Example In this Basic Conversational Example, once started, you send a joke to the activity, and the device responds, and then from the device you send a final payload to close the activity Why did the Storm Trooper buy an iPhone? big star off big star on Carousel Example In this Carousel Example, after starting the activity, you will see a series of images displayed carousel-style on the device, to exit the activity use the four finger exit (touching all four corners of the screen at once) Connect Custom Activities Customer Name: Final Payload: Initial Payload to be Sent to Activity: Joke Response: wss://10.0.0.236:12345/remote_pay Network Clover Connector NFC Example In this NFC Example, after starting the activity, you will see a dialog on the device instructing you to tap an NFC card near the center of the screen. (Note this will currently only work for ByPass Fortress Cards) After tapping the screen the activity will finish and send the card\'s serial number back to the example app Non-Blocking Off On {"Message":"Start Activity"} Questions to be sent to Custom Rating Activity Questions sent to the Custom Rating Activity How would you rate the overall quality of your entree? How would you rate the overall performance of your server? How would you rate the overall value of your dining experience? How likely are you to dine at this establishment again in the near future? Ratings Example In this Ratings Example, once started, the user will enter a phone number into the device, which will then be sent back to the example app, then based on the number, a customer name will be sent back to the device, where the user can choose to rate their experience, and the device will tell the example app (this app) if the user wants to rate their dining experience, if they do then the app will send back the various questions, and the device will send back the answers as they are entered. Once the user hits done the ratings will clear Received Phone Number: Reset Device Send Joke Send Message8 Send Payload Sending Customer Name %1$s to Ratings Custom Activity for phone number %2$s Start Start Activity USB Clover Connector The payload received in a message from the calling system is not a known class. messageType = Web View Example In this Web View Example, you start the custom activity, which will open a Web View on the device, from which you enter in a final payload to close the activity X
